txt.en: Your contributions to the Tale-wardens' desire to catalogue and learn all they can about the history and culture of the Ikorbân Valley earn you greater favour.
Your continued efforts in Shagâna inform the Tale-wardens of the people, history, and tribulations of the land. The records of the Ikorbân Valley's history grow due to your efforts.
You must earn Acquaintance level with the Tale-wardens
